mapper.select: select g.id, g.name, g.images, g.create_time, g.member_id as createMemberId, g.power, m.name as createMemberName, mg.count, g.password, g.num from sys_group g inner join (select count(1) as count , group_id from sys_member_group where group_id in (select group_id from sys_member_group where member_id = #{memberId} and status = 'NORMAL') and status = 'NORMAL' group by group_id) mg on g.id = mg.group_id left join sys_member m on g.member_id = m.id

select g.id, g.name, g.no, g.images, g.power, mg.count, g.member_id as createMemberId, g.power, m.name as createMemberName, g.password, g.num, if(isnull(g.password), 0, 1) as hasPasswordJoin from sys_group g left join (select group_id, count(1) as count from sys_member_group where group_id = #{id} group by group_id) mg on g.id = mg.group_id left join sys_member m on g.member_id = m.id where 1 = 1 and g.id = #{id}

select g.id, g.name, g.no, g.images, g.member_id as createMemberId, s.name as createMemberName, if(isnull(g.password), 0, 1) as hasPasswordJoin, ifnull(sg.count,0) as count, g.num from sys_group g left join sys_member s on g.member_id = s.id left join (select group_id, count(1) as count from sys_member_group where status = 'NORMAL' group by group_id) sg on g.id = sg.group_id where 1 = 1 and g.power = 'PUBLIC' and (g.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%') or g.no LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')) and g.member_id <> #{memberId} limit #{start} , #{limit}

select mg.id, s.id as groupId, s.name as groupName, s.member_id as groupCreateMemberId, m.name as groupCreateMemberName, mg.member_id, m1.name as name, mg.create_time as createTime, m1.avatar from sys_member_group mg left join sys_group s on mg.group_id = s.id left join sys_member m on mg.member_id = m.id left join sys_member m1 on mg.member_id = m1.id where 1 = 1 and mg.member_id = #{memberId} and mg.status = 'APPLY'
